title: Raw harpoonfish

properties.name: description
properties.value: Raw harpoonfish are fish that can be fished from fishing spots in Tempoross Cove. During the fight with Tempoross, they are used as ammunition for harpoonfish cannons. They can be cooked at the shrine, which drains Tempoross' energy more than raw ones. Catching a harpoonfish grants 5 points during the Tempoross fight.

content:
Raw harpoonfish
Released24 March 2021 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo

ExamineAn all natural harpoon substitute.
Values
Value1 coin

Weight0.5 kg
Advanced data
Item ID25564

Raw harpoonfish are fish that can be fished from fishing spots in Tempoross Cove. During the fight with Tempoross, they are used as ammunition for harpoonfish cannons. They can be cooked at the shrine, which drains Tempoross' energy more than raw ones. Catching a harpoonfish grants 5 points during the Tempoross fight.

Fishing[edit | edit source]

Raw harpoonfish
Level required 35
Fishing XP4.5-10
BaitNone
Fishing spotFishing spot (Tempoross Cove)
Required toolHarpoon

Fishing chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to catch a harpoonfish scales from 78.13% at level 35 up to 100% at level 99. When fishing at the spots with leaping harpoonfish, there is a 50% chance to catch a bonus fish on a successful roll.[1]

[[File:Raw harpoonfish detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Raw harpoonfish''' are fish that can be fished from [[Fishing spot (Tempoross Cove)|fishing spots]] in [[Tempoross Cove]]. During the fight with [[Tempoross]], they are used as ammunition for harpoonfish cannons. They can be [[harpoonfish|cooked]] at the [[Shrine (Tempoross Cove)|shrine]], which drains Tempoross' energy more than raw ones. Catching a harpoonfish grants 5 points during the Tempoross fight.

==Fishing==
{{Fishing info
|name = Raw harpoonfish
|level = 35
|xp = 4.5-10
|spot = [[Fishing spot (Tempoross Cove)]]
|tool = {{plink|Harpoon}}
|bait = None
}}

===Fishing chance===
The chance to catch a harpoonfish scales from 78.13% at level 35 up to 100% at level 99. When fishing at the spots with leaping harpoonfish, there is a 50% chance to catch a bonus fish on a successful roll.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Squid|url=https://twitter.com/JagexSquid/status/1450054889300713473|date=18 October 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/dtVT9|archivedate=19 October 2021|quote=Harpoonfish chances are 170 @ Lv 1 (~66%) -> 255 @ Lv 99 (~100%) (normal harpoon). Special spots do a single stat roll for success (same as above), then a flat 50% roll for the extra fish.}}
